content:
Thanks alot!

While browsing around I found this repo, a template for calling Rust from Lean, which I actually wanted to do. (It seems to be in the same Github organization as the library you linked to.) However, there is some problem with the linking against the c++ STL. I've opened a new topic for that, but thanks anyway for the help with linking C code.
Tage Johansson has marked this topic as resolved.
